epd_owner.name: Holcim (Australia) Pty Ltd
epd_owner.address: Level 40, Northpoint Tower, 100 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060, Australia

epd_produced_by.name: Edge Environment Pty Ltd
epd_produced_by.address: Level 3, Greenhouse, 180 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000 Australia

epd_process_certified_by.name: Epsten Group
epd_process_certified_by.address: Suite 2600, 101 Marietta St NW, Atlanta, Georgia 30303, USA

epd_metadata.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)

product_description.product_description: Concrete prepared by mixing cement, coarse and fine aggregates, and water, with or without auxiliary agents and additives. Fresh concrete is placed on site or prefabricated, compacted and hardened by hydration of cement.

product_classes.normal_class: Designed for everyday applications such as residential and commercial foundations, driveways and footpaths.
product_classes.special_class: Supplied to major construction projects including high-rise buildings, dams, spillways, roads, bridges, public works infrastructure; includes high-strength, high-durability, marine application, post-tensioned, high-pumpability, super workable, piling concrete, architectural off-form finishes and decorative applications.

hazard_information.classification: Non-Dangerous Goods according to the Australian Code for the Transport of Dangerous Goods by Road and Rail

product_description.packaging: Delivered in bulk with no packaging

lca_information.scope: Cradle to gate (modules A1-A3) with options modules A4-A5, modules C1-C4 and module D

background_data_preferences: Product specific EPDs for cements, admixtures, pigments and fibres
Australian National Life Cycle Inventory Database (AusLCI v1.42) (2023)
databases_and_software.note_on_impact_categories: Some impact categories (EN15804+A1 and Green Star v1.3) modelled separately based on generic processes

allocation.method: Physical allocation based on weight or m続 of concrete; economic allocation used when physical allocation not possible

excluded_impacts: Environmental impact from infrastructure, construction, production equipment, and tools not directly consumed
Personnel-related impacts such as transportation to/from work
cut_off_criteria.packaging: Only packaging of materials included; all materials delivered without packaging except packaging of materials

data_quality.assessment: Good or very good geographic and temporal representativeness
data_quality.background_data_timeliness: All data updated within 10 years as required by PCR 2019:14

processes_included.upstream: Extraction, transport and manufacturing of raw materials; generation of electricity for modules A1 and A3
processes_included.core: External transportation of materials, manufacturing of concrete (excluding mixing), treatment of waste and wastewater
processes_included.downstream: Distribution, installation, wastage of construction products, transport and treatment of waste at end of life

installation.operational_control: Holcim has no operational control over installation
installation.activities_included: Pouring concrete from truck and pump, manual finishing; excludes pre-installation site work and forms

deconstruction.process: Physical drilling and removal using hydraulic excavator

end_of_life.notes: 100% product collected separately; assumptions based on National Waste Report 2022

targets.2030: Embodied carbon of all construction materials to be at least 40% lower
targets.2050: All new construction materials to be net zero

carbonation.description: Natural process of CO2 absorption by concrete during use stage onward
carbonation.note: Not considered in this EPD and not reflected in results

allocation_method.fly_ash: Treated as waste material; only transport impacts included
allocation_method.ground_granulated_blast_furnace_slag: Allocated economically due to significant economic value
allocation_method.silica_fume: Treated as waste material; only transport impacts included

recycled_materials_handling.background_data_allocation: AusLCI LCA database allocation approach adopted for secondary data and processes
recycled_materials_handling.recycled_aggregate_use: Recycled aggregate replaces virgin coarse aggregate depending on product performance requirements

disclaimers: Results are relative statements and do not indicate endpoints, thresholds, safety margins or risks.
Some impact categories have high uncertainty or limited experience.
Ionizing radiation indicator excludes nuclear accidents, occupational exposure, and radioactive waste disposal effects.
references: Australasian EPD Programme Guidance and Instructions (2017-2024)
British Standards Institution EN 15804:2012+A2:2019 and EN 16757:2017
Department of Climate Change, Energy, the Environment and Water National Waste Report 2022
EPD International General Programme Instructions and PCR 2019:14 V1.3.4
Scientific publications on carbon footprint of Australia's construction sector

contact_information.address: Level 40/100 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060, Australia
